Header: Lena Hoschek shows her two faces to Berlin Fashion Week
Content: Austrian designer Lena Hoschek, a staple of the Berlin Fashion Week, brought a touch of fetish to the German capital with her ‘Season of the witch’ show.For Hoschek spring is the bringer of blossom and warmth but also the season of darker erotic urges and a chance for women to tap into their secret selves.Hoschek’s Spring/Summer collection 2020 is a playful mix of floral patterns and black lace, an ode to the feminine silhouette of her muse Dita Von Teese.Berlin’s Summer Fashion Week runs from 1-6 July.
